notes: Upscale unfurnished apartment with elegant European-style finishes including marble floors, crystal chandeliers, wainscoting, and built-in cabinetry in excellent condition. Good natural light from large windows on a high floor (9F). For baby safety, the smooth marble floors may be slippery, and the open layout has no visible stairs or dangerous balconies, though furniture with rounded corners would be advisable for the empty spaces.
